DOC.brief_summary: The aim compare correlate skeletal muscle erythrocyte fatty acid ( FAs ) profile adult healthy human caloric restriction acute exercise order validate erythrocyte FAs profile marker change muscle fatty acid composition .
DOC.brief_title: Erythrocytes Skeletal-muscle Fatty Acids Are Positively Correlated After Caloric Restriction Exercise
DOC.detailed_description: The study perform 11 healthy sportsman participate caloric restriction trial 1 month . The participant follow caloric restriction , 30-40 % respect usual diet participant , three alternate day weekly along 4 week . After caloric restriction period participant realize exercise stress test . For participant one blood sample muscular biopsy obtain acute exercise caloric restriction intervention . All participant inform purpose demand study give write consent participate . The study protocol accordance Declaration Helsinki research human participant approve local Ethics Committee Consell Catal√† de l'Esport .
DOC.criteria: age ( 1850 year old ) , sex ( male ) , equilibrate diet physical activity 3 day weekly . sex ( female ) , smoker .
